Core: anl4_fcf_median stable with falling anl4_fcf_high-low range implies steadier cash generation. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_fcf_median and anl4_fcf_high (coverage ~0.5545 applied ts_backfill to fcf_high). SUGGESTION4 moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: High actual capital expenditure lower than guidance
results.description: Core: capital_expenditure_reported_value < capital_expenditure_guidance_value indicates capex cut. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; coverage of guidance low so avoided if unreliable. Chosen reported vs est. KEEP_IN_MIND kept short. Confidence 0.55.

Core: operating_profit_before_interest_tax rising faster than sales_estimate_value. SUGGESTION1 used both. SUGGESTION3: sales coverage high; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence 0.63.

Core: est_sga decreasing while est_sales stable implies margin improvement. SUGGESTION1 used est_sga and est_sales. SUGGESTION3: est_sga coverage ~0.5121 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.46.

Core: net_profit_reported_value relative to shareholders_equity_reported_value spike indicates ROE surprise. SUGGESTION1 used both reported fields. SUGGESTION3: coverages adequate. SUGGESTION4 small userCounts but fundamental. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Rapid improvement in cash flow from investing
results.description: Core: anl4_cfi_value > anl4_cfi_mean expectation. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3: anl4_cfi_mean coverage ~0.5849 (<0.6) so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.59.

Core: tangible_book_value_per_share_max_guidance rising vs reported book value suggests upward guidance. SUGGESTION1 used guidance and book_value_per_share_reported_value. SUGGESTION3: coverage high for guidance. SUGGESTION4 low userCount but credible. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Rising reported FCF per share vs estimate
results.description: Core: free_cash_flow_per_share (reported) > est_fcf_ps indicates cash generation beat. SUGGESTION1 used both fields. SUGGESTION3: est_fcf_ps coverage ~0.4642 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 small userCount lowers confidence. KEEP_IN_MIND kept concise. Confidence 0.51.

Core: anl4_totgw_mean trend change signals accounting shifts. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_totgw_mean and anl4_totgw_high. SUGGESTION3: coverage ~0.5374 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: Rising shareholders equity actual vs guidance
results.description: Core: shareholders_equity_actual_value > shareholde rs_equity_max_guidance indicates processing positive balance sheet surprise. SUGGESTION1 used reported and guidance fields (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 limited userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.48.

Core: previous_quarterly_guidance_estimate missing coverage, so we use anl4_dez1basicafv4v104_preest and de z1... fields to detect rollbacks. SUGGESTION1 selected high-coverage previous-estimate fields. SUGGESTION3 used fields with coverage 1.0 where available. SUGGESTION4 used available high-alpha fields. KEEP_IN_MIND ensured simplicity. Confidence 0.42.

Core: compute zscore of ts_delta(anl4_qfv4_eps_mean) to capture relative EPS upgrade. SUGGESTION1 used single high-quality field. SUGGESTION3 no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4 solid userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High realized operating profit vs guidance quarter
results.description: Core: operating_profit_max_guidance_qtr vs operating_profit_before_depr_amort shows guidance misses. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 coverage high. SUGGESTION4 decent userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.65.

Core: est_tot_assets rising trend predicts growth. SUGGESTION1 used est_tot_assets and an l4_totassets_value. SUGGESTION3 coverage >0.72 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High reported operating profit vs median estimate
results.description: Core: operating_profit_before_interest_tax relative to anl4_ebit_median signals outperformance. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 coverages >0.7 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 low userCount but reported values reliable. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence 0.69.

Core: ts_delta(est_ptp) indicates improving pretax profit expectations. SUGGESTION1 used est_ptp. SUGGESTION3 coverage ~0.7527 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.63.

Core: rising anl4_ptp_number (number of estimates) signals increasing coverage and attention; may lead to re-rating. SUGGESTION1 used that field; SUGGESTION3 coverage >0.73 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: High reported FCF per share vs guidance quarter
results.description: Core: free_cash_flow_per_share_reported_value > free_cash_flow_per_share_max_guidance indicates cash surprise. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 coverage low so ts_backfill avoided for guidance. SUGGESTION4 low alphaCount reduces confidence. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Rising median eps after decreasing std
results.description: Core: anl4_afv4_median_eps up while anl4_afv4_dts_spe down: consensus strengthening with higher median. SUGGESTION1 used both. SUGGESTION3 std coverage ~0.691 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum of announced cash flow per share
results.description: Core: last_diff_value of anI4_af_cfps_value to detect recent positive jumps. SUGGESTION1 used actual cfps. SUGGESTION3 coverage ~0.6156 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 small userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND brief. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Rising estimated net debt improvement trend
results.description: Core: ts_delta(anl4_netdebt_mean) negative (decline) signals debt paydown. SUGGESTION1 used netdebt fields. SUGGESTION3: anl4_netdebt_mean coverage ~0.5156 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND kept short. Confidence 0.47.

Core: anl4_fsguidanceqfv4_maxguidance rising while fsguidance median also rises shows concentrated management guidance upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used guidance fields with coverage ~0.3053 low so avoided; instead used sales_estimate_maximum which has coverage 1.0. SUGGESTION3 avoided low-coverage fields. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: High earnings per share product persistence
results.description: Core: product of recent two-period ts_delta of anl4_epsr_mean to capture sustained upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_epsr_mean. SUGGESTION3 coverage high so no backfill. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal operators. Confidence 0.62.

Core: ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_cfi_value)) picks improving investing cashflow activity that could be structural. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_cfi_value. SUGGESTION3 coverage ~0.4859 so applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND kept short. Confidence 0.44.

Core: anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue median increase signals upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used ratingvalue. SUGGESTION3 coverage ~0.7104 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence 0.58.

Core: ts_max_diff(anl4_qf_az_eps_mean, 252) measures how far current mean is above past max; breakout indicator. SUGGESTION1 used single field with high coverage. SUGGESTION3 no backfill. SUGGESTION4 strong counts. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Consensus median uplift vs long-run mean
results.description: Core: anl4_dez1qfv4_est relative to ts_mean(anl4_dez1qfv4_est,252) detects long-run upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used that field. SUGGESTION3 coverage ~0.964 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 strong. KEEP_IN_MIND kept short. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Large upward change in broker count
results.description: Core: ts_delta(anl4_basicdetaillt_person) captures new brokers covering stock. SUGGESTION1 used that broker id field. SUGGESTION3 coverage ~0.6827 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Strong reported EBITDA relative to long-run
results.description: Core: anl4_ebitda_value - ts_mean(anl4_ebitda_value,252) gauges surprise relative to annual history. SUGGESTION1 used a single reported field with high coverage. SUGGESTION3 no backfill. SUGGESTION4 strong alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Rising pretax income vs median estimate
results.description: Core: pretax_income_total - anl4_ptp_median shows large positive deviations. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 coverages high. SUGGESTION4 moderate reliability. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence 0.67.
